articles.title: The Fitness And Wellness Trends Set To Dominate 2021 - GQ Australia
articles.description: The global pandemic completely revolutionised the fitness industry, as gyms and coaches quickly had to adapt to online workouts. While our motivation remains high in the New Year, these are the trends that will be sure to shape 2021.
